AndroBOINC is the manager for [http://boinc.berkeley.edu/ BOINC] made for Android platform. Main usage of AndroBOINC is remote control of BOINC core clients, the function is similar to the standard BOINC manager, but interface of AndroBOINC is adapted to small screens typical for mobile phones.
